organization.description:
St. Matthew's House and Immokalee Friendship House offer emergency transitional housing with a mandatory recovery program (170 beds), Justin's Place substance-abuse recovery program, Wolfe Apartments affordable transitional apartment complex with two-year mandatory program, feeding ministry at Justin's Place building, two food pantries, three thrift stores, Direct Assistance program for the community in need, SMH Catering (full-service catering company as social enterprise and part of resident recovery).

###COL###
organization.name: SAINT MATTHEW'S HOUSE, INC.
